data.message: I have been notified I am a winner in a sweepstakes but have to pay to receive the winnings.  Is this real. how can people be using your name if this is a hoax???

replies.message: Hey Jo-Anne. This is a hoax. We strongly suggest that you don't provide any personal information and report spam using these steps: http://on.fb.me/1moFLLN. Thanks. -Rey

They actually used a friend - deleted her and resent a friend request - cannot something be done about this.  I did what she said and now I'm scared. Catherine Waldbott messaged me and says she works at FB
I have been contacted. Twice by women stating they. Work at face book and I have won large sums of money
They claim to work for Facebook and wanted. Me to pay

It is a federal law there breaking when they want you to send money through money gram , western union or any other means , the ones getting the money have been scammed already and now stuck in a money pyramid with no control or they have another account set up somewhere to draw it out .
